A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a disappointment. With lousy writing and a lousy story it definitely shows that it is a disappointment. Not even a great performance by Mark Hamil himself can save it. This movie crashed the sequel trilogy and is now in a gigantic hole that it's gonna have to take a miracle to get out of. The Last Jedi falls short of my expectations and is an embarrass to the Star Wars saga.
